events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role and the candidate's resume looks promising with relevant experience in backend development.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software engineer and backend developer in the resume.
A recruiter with experience in engineering hiring has been assigned to follow up with the candidate and coordinate the next steps in the process.
The initial phone screening was successfully completed, and the candidate demonstrated good knowledge of software development principles and coding practices.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview invitation and expressed enthusiasm about the engineering position and working with the development team.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to evaluate coding skills, system design knowledge, and problem-solving abilities.
